original_text: And upward from what had the appearance of his waist I saw as it were gleaming metal, like the appearance of fire enclosed all around. And downward from what had the appearance of his waist I saw as it were the appearance of fire, and there was brightness around him.
korean_text: 내가 보니 그 허리 위의 모양은 단 쇠 같아서 그 속과 주위가 불 같고 내가 보니 그 허리 아래의 모양도 불 같아서 사방으로 광채가 나며

sentences.original_text: And upward from what had the appearance of his waist
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 허리처럼 보이는 것으로부터 위쪽으로는

sentences.original_text: I saw as it were gleaming metal
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 마치 반짝이는 금속 같은 것을 보았으며

sentences.original_text: like the appearance of fire enclosed all around
And downward from what had the appearance of his waist
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 허리처럼 보이는 것으로부터 아래쪽으로는

sentences.original_text: I saw as it were the appearance of fire
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 마치 불의 모양 같은 것을 보았으며

sentences.original_text: and there was brightness around him
